news_header: A fire at a shopping centre in Sao Paulo, Brazil, destroyed over 200 stores and caused significant damage, but no fatalities have been reported.
news_text: A massive fire engulfed a shopping centre in Sao Paulo, Brazil, destroying more than 200 stores and spreading across 18,000 square metres. The smoke rose over 150 metres high, and part of the roof collapsed. Firefighters extinguished the flames after 15 hours, with no reported fatalities, and the cause is under investigation.
